character.noteList: Half-Elf Features: • Within 60 feet of you, treat dim light as bright, darkness as dim light • Immune to magical sleep, advantage on saves vs charmed • Can cast the dancing lights cantrip. At 3rd level, faerie fire (1/day). At 5th level, darkness (1/day) (use Cha for DCs) Urchin Feature: • Your party can travel through a city twice as fast when not in combat Druid Features: • Understand a secret druid language • You can shapeshift into the form of a beast as an action (see rules) • Druid Archetype: Moon • You can wild shape as a bonus action, and can use up a spell slot to regain 1d8 hp per spell slot level as a bonus action while wild shaped • You can wild shape into beasts of CR equal to your druid level/3 (min 1) • Crossbow Expert: You don't have disadvantage from adjacent enemies on ranged attacks, you can load crossbows faster, and you can make a bonus action attack with a hand crossbow after attacking with a one-handed weapon ⊠Light Armor, Medium Armor, Shields ⊠Clubs, Daggers, Darts, Javelins, Maces, Quarterstaffs, Scimitars, Sickles, Slings, Spears ⊠Disguise kit Thieves' tools Herbalism Kit ⊠Common Elvish Extra Language Druidic ⊠leather armor crossbow, light quarterstaff explorer's pack druidic focus small knife map of your home city pet mouse token of your parents set of common clothes belt pouch ⊠⊠Druid 4⊠Variant⊠Urchin⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠Gavin⊠Druid 4⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠10⊠0⊠0
